== Parcellite ' s features ==

Current default method of entering Items from parcellite's list is to select the Item from the list and then paste  <<BR>>
===== Proposals =====
   {i} Key = A configurable Key / key combination <<BR>>

=== Persistance ===
There are mainly two types of contents in the clipboard
 1 . Those with their content in the clip-board <<BR>>
 2 . Those with a symbolic Link to a file <<BR>>
===== Proposals =====
 {o} Allow exporting / importing of the first type of contents ; Just like a note - taker .
=== Separate Single item Clip board ===
User may not like all of the copied items going to the list ; So
===== Proposals =====
 {o} A separate Key / Key combination to copy /cut or paste from parcellite .
=== Preview ===
===== Proposals =====
 {o} Show a preview of the content , near the system-tray ; Like that of SCIM . <<BR>>
 {o} Mouse scoll event over this previw should be used for selecting the Items <<BR>>
